Title: Relates to limiting the use of a victims DNA collected from sexual offense evidence kits
Summary: Prohibits the use of a victim's DNA collected from sexual offense evidence kits from being added to the state DNA identification index or other databases or being used in certain actions.
LawCode: Amd §§995-c & 838-a, Exec L; amd §2805-i, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public health law, in relation to the use of DNA collected from sexual offense evidence kits
